text: Crafted by the Runesmiths and Runelords of the Dawi.
Weak and disposable, can help in a pinch. Low costs and recharge.
Crafted by the smiths of Vaul and imbued by powerful mages.
Strong and long lasting effects. High costs and recharge.
Of no real use other than salvaging.
Useful in the right context. Balanced costs and recharge.
One of a kind! Strong and long lasting effects. High costs and recharge.
